Key Match Events: Tommy Pham belted a three-run home run against Cleveland starter Ben Lively in the fourth
Miscellaneous Highlights: The loss snapped a three-game winning streak for Cleveland, which nonetheless saw its magic number to clinch the American League Central Division drop to 19 as Minnesota lost at Tampa Bay
Others: The Royals, however, matched the Twins at 4 1/2 games behind Cleveland in the race for the AL Central crown
Erick Sabrowski, who joined Cleveland on Aug. 28, made his Major League debut with two out in the seventh
